H0.text: who plays harley quinn. Margot Robbie

H1.text: who plays harley quinn. Emma Stone

H2.text: who plays harley quinn. Scarlett Johansson

H3.text: who plays harley quinn. Mia Sara

A4.text: Robbie became the first person to portray DC Comics villain Harley Quinn in live-action when she signed on to David Ayer's 2016 superhero film Suicide Squad alongside an ensemble cast that included Will Smith, Jared Leto and Viola Davis.

A5.text: She reprised the role of Harley Quinn in Cathy Yan's Birds of Prey (2020).
